english_example_sentence: If you had stood up quickly, you would have caught the bus.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты быстро встал, ты бы успел на автобус.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen hemen yerinden durmuşsan, son otobüsü yakalamış olurdun.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen hemen yerinden ______, son otobüsü yakalamış olurdun.
